lead_paragraph: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp has implored fans to stop singing his name during matches to help his side stay focussed and avoid complacency.

headline.print_headline: Klopp Wants Liverpool Fans to Stop Singing His Name
headline.main: Klopp Wants Liverpool Fans to Stop Singing His Name

snippet: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp has implored fans to stop singing his name during matches to help his side stay focussed and avoid complacency....
